articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Farms in Yonan County
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Farms in Yonan County
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju of the DPRK made a field survey of farms in Yonan County of South Hwanghae Province.
					 He went round the Township Co-op Farm and the Puhung Co-op Farm in Yonan County and learnt about manpower and operation of farming machines and progress in rice transplanting and encouraged the agricultural workers in the immediate farming campaign.
					
					 Then a consultative meeting was convened to take steps for raising the grain yield by distributing the crops and species on the principle of the right crop on the right soil, the right crop in the right season, and manuring and cultivating crops on a sci-tech basis, as required by the Juche methods of farming, and for the relevant units to satisfactorily provide necessary farming materials.
					
					 Earlier, the premier inspected the Sunchon Cement Complex and the Yonbaek Saltern to discuss the measures for supplying more cement to the socialist construction sites and radically increase the salt production with underground ultra-saline water.

articles.title: DPRK Health Minister's Speech at 70th World Health Assembly
articles.content:
DPRK Health Minister's Speech at 70th World Health Assembly
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk, head of the DPRK health delegation, made a speech at the 70th World Health Assembly in Geneva of Switzerland on Wednesday.
					 It is quite significant to gather together for general discussion under the theme of "Building Better Systems for Health in the Age of Sustainable Development" in succession to the previous theme of "Transforming Our World; the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development", he said, adding:
					
					 Over the last one year, the world has advanced at the big stride in achieving the SDGs, particularly, the health-related goals such as reducing maternal and child mortality, combating communicable diseases and NCDs, access to essential drugs and increasing the health workforce, etc.
					
					 The DPRK government, having endorsed on the SDGs considered to be in conformity with its policy of building a socialist power, has vigorously steered forward for those implementation based on the long-existing solid national health system with the fully-guaranteed free Universal Health Coverage as its backbone.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, at the 7th WPK Congress projected the important tasks facing the health sector to drastically decrease the prevalence of the diseases, to strengthen the household doctor system, to improve the quality of the health services, to promote the medical science & technology and to strengthen the medical supplies provision.
					
					 Under the 5-year National Economy Development Strategic Plan, the health sector has set the ambitious target to improve many health indicators like expectancy, infant mortality rate and maternal mortality ratio up to the advanced world level by the year 2020.
					
					 The consistent fundamental motto of the health sector is to leave no one left behind from the benefit of free universal health coverage and to provide utmost devotion to all the patients in all the health facilities, while focusing on the children, the future of the country.
					
					 The good example is the priority construction of the health facilities, nurseries, kindergartens and schools in the flood-affected northern part of the country last year, and the recent modern renovation of all the provincial baby homes, children's homes and primary and middle schools for orphans.
					
					 Under the direct care and energetic guidance of the respected Supreme Leader, such new health facilities have been built over the last one year alone as Ryugyong General Eye Hospital and Medical Oxygen Factory.
					
					 Meanwhile, nationwide tele-medicine network has been technically upgraded, pharmaceutical factories renovated, pre-service & in-service medical education further improved with special inputs to the household doctors at the PHC level, and the quality of the vaccination & deworming programs further strengthened.
					
					 Since the health-related SDGs are not the sole responsibility of the health sector only, rather, the nationwide work requiring the collaboration between all the relevant sectors and stakeholders, many health issues like TB control, addressing NCD & tobacco control, preventing the importation of newly-emerging epidemic diseases like ebola & zika virus are being well-coordinated at the national multi-sectoral levels.
					
					 All these have contributed immensely to cement our people-centered health system and promoting the people's health, and we dare to proudly say that these achievements are so precious and valid for having been secured with our own resources, despite of the unprecedented sanctions and blockade against the DPRK imposed by the hostile forces.
					
					 Two years have already elapsed since the adoption of the 2030 Agenda on Sustainable Development, but the challenges impeding the independent development of sovereign countries continue to be existing in the international arena.
					
					 SDGs strongly require strict respect to the territorial integrity and political independence, guarantee of the complete and lasting sovereignty exercise of economic activities and prohibition of economic, monetary and trade measures contradicting the international laws and UN Charter.
					
					 These SDGs aspiring for the welfare of mankind will never be achieved, as far as the tyrannical political, military and economic pressure and threat of one-sided criteria and hostile concept towards other countries' political system are not terminated.
					
					 The SDGs are an action program common to humankind that promised to remove social inequality and poverty on a worldwide scale and build a world which guarantees the full play to the dignity and creative ability of human being and rich life of not only the present generations but also posterity.
					
					 The DPRK government is committed to continuing its close collaboration with WHO and many countries in its efforts to attain the health-related SDGs.

articles.title: THAAD Deployment Will Incur Punishment by Nation: NPCK Spokesman
articles.content:
THAAD Deployment Will Incur Punishment by Nation: NPCK Spokesman
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea (NPCK) issued a statement Saturday over the fact that the south Korean ruling quarters take irresolute attitude toward the issue of THAAD deployment.
					 Noting that the struggle of people from all walks of life demanding the cancellation of THAAD deployment is now getting intensified in south Korea, the statement said:
					
					 However, the "Liberal Korea Party" and other conservative groups and political philistines assert that the withdrawal of THAAD may undermine the south Korea-U.S. alliance and cause "division of public opinion", and the new south Korean authorities are taking an ambivalent approach to the public demand for the withdrawal of THAAD under such pretexts as "prudent solution" and "procedures of approval by the National Assembly".
					
					 To deploy THAAD or to withdraw it would serve as a cornerstone discerning the acts of sycophancy toward outsiders from the stand of prioritizing the nation, and there should be no compromise here, the statement said, clarifying the following principled stand:
					
					 1. THAAD deployment is a traitorous act of leaving the land of south Korea as the eternal advanced military base for the U.S. realization of strategy for world domination. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities have to make its stand clear, well aware that the deployment is a senseless and traitorous act of drawing water to the U.S. mill for a nuclear war and providing it with a foothold for aggression.
					
					 2. The deployment is a thrice-cursed act of treachery that would reduce the Korean peninsula into a theatre for nuclear war of big powers and invite unprecedentedly terrible disaster.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities approves the deployment to toe the U.S. line, it will be recorded as a treachery putting the "Ulsa (1905) five traitors" into the shade.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have to make a bold decision of withdrawing THAAD without delay, mindful that the nation is seriously watching them.
					
					 3. The deployment constitutes a crime against the nation as it is aimed to remove the nuclear sword of justice that would guarantee the dignity, security and eternal prosperity of the nation, with the help of aggressors.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear deep in mind the fact that the act of the conservative group to get rid of the nuclear treasured sword of justice by introducing THAAD is just a foolish and traitorous deed.
					
					 THAAD deployment is one of the worst evils done by the Park Geun Hye group and its withdrawal is a strong demand of the candlelight demonstrators and the irreversible trend of the times.
					
					 Anyone who allows the U.S. THAAD deployment for aggression would be forsaken and sternly punished by the nation just like the group of conservatives.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Fulfill Legal and Moral Duty for Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Fulfill Legal and Moral Duty for Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims Saturday issued a statement in denunciation of the Japanese government's "document of refutation".
					 The UN Committee against Torture early in May released a report calling for reexamination of the "agreement" between Japan and south Korea over the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 Terming the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army victims of the sexual slavery system in the whole period of the Second World War, the report said the Japan-south Korea "agreement" on the issue signed in late 2015 is insufficient for reinstating the victims.
					
					 The Japanese government strongly defied it and came out with a "document of refutation".
					
					 The Japanese government protested against the UN Committee against Torture's labeling the "comfort women" for the Japanese army as sexual slaves and asserted the "agreement" was the final and irreversible one. 
					
					 Noting that the government of Japan slandered the report of the international body fairly reflecting the world public opinion and justified and beautified its past crimes, the statement criticizes this as a shameless distortion of history, cruel insult to the victims and grave challenge to the world community.
					
					 Appreciation and judge on the crimes cannot be made by criminals, it says, and goes on:
					
					 Criminals should reflect themselves according to the punishment by justice and legislation and have duty to be responsible for them.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should clearly understand that their reckless distortion of history and evasion of responsibility for the past crimes are improper acts of self-destruction and opt to fulfill their legal and moral duty for the crimes with sincerity, though belatedly.

articles.title: Military Provocation to DPRK by S. Korean Warmongers
articles.content:
Military Provocation to DPRK by S. Korean Warmongers
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The puppet military of south Korea let a spy drone "Heron" intrude deep into the territorial air of the DPRK four times while flying above the hotspot waters of the West Sea of Korea and its vicinity from 07:46 to 20:40 on May 26.
					 Such grave military provocation was committed when the U.S. imperialists forward-deployed four "Global Hawks" and over 100 pilots at the Yokoda air base of Japan, near the DPRK, from Guam under the pretext of escaping from typhoon.
					
					 The recent adventurous provocation is prompted by their sinister scheme to ward off the growing demand of the south Korean people for improved north-south relations and ignite a war for invasion of the north, pursuant to their U.S. master's anti-DPRK policy.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers continue to commit military provocations escalating the tension of the Korean peninsula, despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK. But such moves will only invite merciless retaliatory counteraction of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Participants in Int'l Trade Fair Leave
articles.content:
Participants in Int'l Trade Fair Leave
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Delegations of different countries and regions left here on Friday and Saturday after taking part in the 20th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair.

articles.title: Salt Production Increased
articles.content:
Salt Production Increased
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Salterns in the west coastal area of the DPRK have increased production with underground ultra-saline water.
					 Among them is the Namsi Saltern that has tapped over 5o ultra-saline water deposits and carried out boring for them in an effective way.
					
					 It has drawn tens of thousands cubic meters of underground ultra-saline water from those deposits, so as to boost the production by three times.
					
					 And it leveled and hardened tens of hectares of evaporating and crystallization grounds and cleaned out thousands meters-long waterway.
					
					 It has also been pushed forward to increase the proportion of mechanization in salt-making.

articles.title: Japanese Regime Should Not Go Impudent: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Japanese Regime Should Not Go Impudent: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Japan, hell-bent on antagonizing the DPRK, is going impudent over the operation of its liner Mangyongbong.
					 The chief Cabinet secretary of Japan said it would heed the impact of the operation of Mangyongbong on the efforts of other countries for tackling the issue of nuclear and rocket programs of Pyongyang.
					
					 And the foreign minister imprudently asserted that Japan expects Russia to take a responsible approach to settling the Korean issue.
					
					 This is just manifestation of the Japanese reactionaries' inveterate hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Japan is not entitled to say this or that about the liner.
					
					 The liner is just an international tourist ship which contributes to promoting the economic ties and humanitarian exchange under an agreement between the DPRK and Russia.
					
					 Japan has put an embargo on the liner for more than one decade, blocking the sea route of Koreans in Japan for visiting the homeland. Not content with this human rights abuse, it is faulting even regular economic exchange and visits between countries, revealing once again the hideous nature of its policy hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 What dignitaries of Japan uttered to link the bilateral cooperation between the DPRK and Russia with a military purpose is just sophism to justify its policy hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 Since the end of the Second World War, Japan has resorted to undisguised political and economic blockade and military moves against the DPRK in a sinister bid to realize the wild ambition for "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere." This only drew criticism and rejection by the international community.
					
					 In 2003 when the DPRK remained a non-nuclear state, Japan hatched a plot to justify its moves against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) by branding the liner as a drug-smuggling boat.
					
					 The Japanese regime is justifying its policy hostile to the DPRK, terming the steps taken by it for bolstering its military muscle to tackle the U.S. imperialists' nuclear blackmail a "threat" to Japan and the world.
					
					 The recent accusation of the Japanese reactionaries against the liner is just part of the smear campaign.
					
					 It is their purpose to suffocate the DPRK through complete economic blockade and secure a favorable opportunity for launching reinvasion.
					
					 Japan is, indeed, the sworn enemy of the Korean people as it is seized with inveterate hostility toward the DPRK.
					
					 Such mean act of Japan can never stun the DPRK. Japan had better not run riot, refraining from such narrow-minded behavior.

articles.title: End to Confrontation with Compatriots Urged
articles.content:
End to Confrontation with Compatriots Urged
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- It is necessary for south Korea to put an end to the traitorous acts of confrontation with the fellow countrymen pursued in collusion with outsiders, if the north-south relations are to improve, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The inter-Korean relations will improve and the path for dialogue, cooperation, peace and reunification will be opened when all Koreans prioritize the compatriots and pool their efforts. But, if they prioritize outsiders and, depending on them, persist in confrontation with the fellow countrymen, the path for dialogue and cooperation will be blocked, mistrust and tension escalated and the situation driven to the brink of a war.
					
					 The situation was deteriorated and complicated as the south Korean conservative group took the lead in the campaign of confrontation with the fellow countrymen, zealously following the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK. Nevertheless, the DPRK repeatedly advanced sincere proposals for peace and reunification of the country and the improved inter-Korean relations and took practical measures with good intention.
					
					 However, the south Korean puppet conservative group, obsessed with flunkeyism and dependence on outsiders, had openly challenged to the DPRK efforts, desperately blocking the way of improved north-south relations and national reunification. 
					
					 Every sin brings punishment to it.
					
					 The conservative group, which was frantic with bloodshot eyes to hurt the north by pursuing the unprecedented confrontation policy, is floundering in the pit dug by itself. At the same time, its worst-ever anti-DPRK policy went to the total bankruptcy.
					
					 Now is the time to give up the outdated confrontation policy which drove the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe, hurting the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The only way for defusing the war crisis on the Korean peninsula and opening the path to reconciliation, cooperation, peace and reunification is to renounce the policy of dependence on outsiders and confrontation and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Elimination of Park Geun Hye-led Conservatives Is Demand of Times: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Elimination of Park Geun Hye-led Conservatives Is Demand of Times: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea, who was jailed after being impeached for her thrice-cursed crimes, let Hwang Kyo An and other minions send to the Archives or scrap all documents of Chongwadae though they had to be handed over to the new regime.
					 Only a ten-page report on management rules of Chongwadae reportedly remains untouched.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 Such a crime can be committed only by viper-like Park Geun Hye who inherited the ferocious disposition of traitor Park Chung-Hee, the "yusin" dictator.
					
					 The reality clearly shows how desperately Park Geun Hye and her minions work to hush up their crimes so as to evade the stern punishment by history.
					
					 The public candlelight actions that swept south Korea to impeach Park are now calling for eliminating evils of society.
					
					 The scrapping of the Chongwadae documents illustrates that the struggle against the conservative remnants has not yet ended and the spearhead for eliminating the evils should be directed on traitor Park and her minions.
					
					 To completely get rid of the cult of "yusin" dictatorship and its remnants by forcing the Park group to pay dearly for their crimes is just an unquenchable demand of the times.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flails U.S. Reckless Moves to Stifle DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flails U.S. Reckless Moves to Stifle DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Recently, the U.S. House of Representatives passed a new bill on sanctions against the DPRK, calling for a perfect network of sanctions and blockade. Its keynote is to extend the range of independent sanctions against the DPRK to the maximum and impose tougher sanctions upon the businesses, organizations and individuals trading with the DPRK and employing its workers.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 This is just a reckless move to stifle the DPRK at any cost by depriving it of its vital rights and ratcheting up international pressure upon it to the maximum.
					
					 The Trump administration, which set the "maximum pressure and engagement" as its policy toward the DPRK, seeks to make even a little success by buckling down to putting the toughest sanctions and pressure on it, but it is no more than a wild dream.
					
					 The DPRK has always been exposed to sanctions of the U.S.
					
					 It is a great country of self-reliance and self-development which builds up its own strength, resolutely standing up against the ever-escalating sanctions and pressure.
					
					 The ill-intended move of the Trump administration resorting to strong-arm policy, sanctions and pressure, failing to learn a lesson from a serious mistake of his predecessors whose policy hostile to the DPRK proved futile, will only lead the U.S. to the final doom. 
					
					 It is just the U.S. which will get isolated worldwide with the passage of time.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea Stage Joint Naval Maneuvers
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Stage Joint Naval Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean warmongers staged joint naval maneuvers in the waters off west Thaean, South Chungchong Province from May 24 to 26, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Involved in the maneuvers were helicopters of the Second Division of the U.S. forces in south Korea and ten odd warships including submarines and escort ships, sea-patrol planes and copters for naval operation of the Second Fleet of the south Korean navy and fighters and Apache copters unit of the air and ground forces of south Korea.
					
					 The warmongers fanned up war fever, vociferating about preserving "northern limit line" and "retaliatory punishment".

articles.title: DPRK Book Exhibition, Lecture and Film Show Held in Brazil
articles.content:
DPRK Book Exhibition, Lecture and Film Show Held in Brazil
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK book exhibition, lecture and film show took place in Brasilia of Brazil on May 18.
					 On display at the event venue were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and books introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants watched a Korean documentary "Dawn of Victory Lighting the World".
					
					 Present at the event were personages of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, the private educational institution of the Brasilia Federal District and teachers' union and citizens and the DPRK embassy officials.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Brasilia Federal District Committee of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil who is member of the National Executive Committee of the Party and other speakers praised the feats of the great leaders for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people and the cause of global independence.
					
					 They expressed support and solidarity with the army and people of the DPRK in the struggle to increase in every way the military capability for self-defence in the face of the U.S. persistent nuclear threat.

articles.title: DPRK's Test-Launch of Hwasong-12 Hailed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Test-Launch of Hwasong-12 Hailed Abroad
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A Russian social organization and a Nepalese personage congratulated the DPRK on its successful test-fire of rocket Hwasong-12.
					 The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK issued the following statement on May 14:
					
					 The successful test-launch of ground-to-ground medium-to-long range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12 clearly demonstrated before the world people that the DPRK is a great power.
					
					 It also showed that the test-launch of ICBM declared by the DPRK was not hot air.
					
					 No dangerous military provocations of the U.S. can prevent the DPRK from bolstering up the military capability for self-defence.
					
					 The recent test-fire greatly encourages the Korean people in their all-out efforts to build an economic power.
					
					 Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, contributed the following article to the Nepalese paper Arpan on May 19:
					
					 The successful test-fire of Hwasong-12 supervised by Marshal Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Korean people, is a great event in defusing the danger of war on the Korean peninsula and defending the peace and stability of the world.
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to him who guided the test-fire to success.
					
					 The recent test-fire is more significant because it was conducted when the U.S. was escalating the moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The world should know what important contribution the DPRK has made to averting war and preserving peace.

articles.title: Test-fire of Hwasonog-12 Is Great Victory of Korean People: Nigerian Personage
articles.content:
Test-fire of Hwasonog-12 Is Great Victory of Korean People: Nigerian Personage
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria who is co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and chairman of the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, released a statement on May 17 over the DPRK's successful test-fire of Hwasong-12.
					 The successful test-launch is a great victory of the Korean people, and it is of importance and special significance in ensuring peace and security of the region, the statement said, adding:
					
					 This great event, which gave fresh confidence to the world progressives, proved once again that no force could stop the army and people of the DPRK from vigorously advancing towards the final victory, united close around respected HE Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The U.S. should neither shun nor misjudge the stark reality in which the DPRK is possessed of powerful means for deadly retaliatory strike, and it had better know well that it will suffer the worst disaster in history if it dares provoke the DPRK through reckless acts.
					
					 The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria urges the U.S. to opt for improving the relations with the DPRK by concluding peace accord with it, well aware of its strategic position. And it calls upon the international community to support the principled and peace-loving stand and efforts of the DPRK for peace and stability on the Korean peninsula from the point of a fair deal.

articles.title: British Bodies Brand U.S. Imperialists as Real Culprit in Kwangju Bloodbath
articles.content:
British Bodies Brand U.S. Imperialists as Real Culprit in Kwangju Bloodbath
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on May 19 on the occasion of the 37th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising in south Korea.
					 The statement cited facts to disclose that the Chun Doo Hwan military fascist junta brutally killed uprisers and innocent people under the backstage manipulation of the U.S. when the uprising against the colonial fascist rule began in Kwangju of south Korea 37 years ago.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are the real culprit in the Kwangju bloodbath
					
					 Their hands are stained with blood.
					
					 We bitterly condemn the killers.
					
					 We strongly demand that a strict probe be made into all the fact about the massacre and punish the real culprits responsible for it.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju averigua la situacion de faenas agricolas del distrito de Yonan
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju averigua la situacion de faenas agricolas del distrito de Yonan
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo como van las faenas agricolas en el distrito de Yonan de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.
					Recorriendo la granja cooperativa de la cabecera distrital y la otra de Puhung, el hizo conocimiento del estado de movilizacion de la fuerza laboral y maquinas agricolas y del resultado de transplante de las posturas de arroz y estimulo mucho a los agricultores.
					
					En la reunion de consulta, se hizo enfasis en aumentar el rendimiento de cereales al sembrar las plantaciones y sus variedades en el terreno adecuado y el tiempo propicio segun el metodo de cultivo Juche y realizar segun la norma cientifico-tecnica el abonamiento y cuidado de ellas.
					
					Se tomaron las medidas para hacer a las unidades vinculadas suministrar a tiempo los materiales necesarios a la agricultura.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier visito el Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon y la salina de Yonbaek donde discutio los problemas surgidos en enviar mucho mas cemento a los lugares de construccion de importantes objetos y en incrementar decisivamente la produccion de sal con el agua ultrasalada subterranea.

articles.title: RPDC cooperara con OMS y otros paises, apunta el jefe de delegacion coreana
articles.content:
RPDC cooperara con OMS y otros paises, apunta el jefe de delegacion coreana
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- El ministro de Salud Publica, Kang Ha Guk, quien preside la delegacion de salud publica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, pronuncio el dia 24 un discurso en la 70a sesion plenaria de la asamblea de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud (OMS) que tiene lugar en Ginebra de Suiza.
					  El dijo que es muy significativo discutir el tema general "Construyamos mejor sistema de salud en la era de desarrollo sostenible" en sucesion al tema previo "Transformemos nuestro mundo; Agenda de 2030 para el desarrollo sostenible", y prosiguio:
					
					  Considerando que las metas incluidas en la agenda de desarrollo sostenible convienen a la politica de construccion de una potencia socialista, el gobierno de la RPDC expreso apoyo a ellas y dio buen impulso a su cumplimiento a base de la solida base del sistema sanitario estatal centrado en la asistencia medica gratuita y general, establecida hace mucho tiempo.
					
					  Segun la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional, la rama de salud publica de la RPDC logro muchos exitos en el cumplimiento de su ambiciosa meta de situar hasta 2020 en el nivel avanzado mundial muchos indices como el aumento de la esperanza de vida promedia y la reduccion de la mortalidad infantil y la de embarazadas y paridas.
					
					  El cumplimiento de las metas de salud publica indicadas en la agenda de desarrollo sostenible no se limita a este sector porque resulta una labor estatal que requiere de la cooperacion de todos los organos vinculados y las entidades sociales.
					
					  Por esta razon, coordinan en el nivel estatal muchos problemas sanitarios, inclusive las actividades para bloquear la entrada de nuevas epidemias.
					
					  Quisiera declarar con orgullo que todas esas actividades y los exitos logrados en su curso contribuyeron mucho a consolidar firmemente el sistema de salud publica centrado en las masas populares y fomentar la salud publica y resultaron mas preciosos y valiosos porque fueron alcanzados en el principio de autofortalecimiento a pesar de la sancion y bloqueo sin precedentes de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					  La agenda de desarrollo sostenible demanda fuertemente respetar la integridad territorial y la independencia politica de todos los Estados, garantizar el ejercicio de soberania total y eterna sobre las riquezas, recursos naturales y actividades economicas y prohibir la toma de las medidas economicas, financieras y comerciales opuestas a la ley internacional y la Carta de la ONU.
					
					  El gobierno de la RPDC seguira cooperando estrechamente con la OMS y otros paises del mundo para alcanzar las metas de salud publica presentadas en la mencionada agenda.

articles.title: Pak Myong Guk condena "sancion adicional" que reclaman EE.UU. y sus seguidores
articles.content:
Pak Myong Guk condena "sancion adicional" que reclaman EE.UU. y sus seguidores
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- Atemorizados ante los eventos multiples y sucesivos que anuncian el incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, EE.UU. y sus satelites estan reclamando la llamada "sancion adicional".
					Al respecto, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC, Pak Myong Guk, publico el dia 26 una declaracion.
					
					Ante el rechazo de muchos paises que no desean la agravacion de la situacion, EE.UU. maniobra astutamente ahora para alcanzar su sucio objetivo estableciendo el clima de "condena" a la RPDC, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					Segun el guion de EE.UU., algunos paises conocidos como sus aliados publicaron por separados la llamada declaracion de "condena".
					
					No nos vale la pena discutir lo que hacen esos paises que aceptan a ciegas los dictados de EE.UU. faltando a la justicia y al principio.
					
					Lo que queremos senalar es la conducta de unos paises no aliados de EE.UU. que se suman a la campana de "condena".
					
					Plantean el pretexto de que los lanzamientos de cohetes por parte de la RPDC constituyen una violacion de la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. Esto es una expresion de que ellos ignoran o no quieren reconocer el hecho de que esa misma "resolucion" es un producto de la pauta de doble rasero que no tiene ningun fundamento legal.
					
					Exigimos en varias ocasiones al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que nos explicara el fundamento legal de la "resolucion de sancion" anticoreana y propusimos al Secretariado de la ONU la organizacion de un forum internacional de jurisperitos para ese fin. Pero, no hemos recibido todavia ninguna respuesta.
					
					El problema es que esos paises hablan de la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region al expresar la "condena" o "preocupacion" sobre los lanzamientos de cohetes de nuestro pais, pero no hacen ninguna referencia al hecho de que EE.UU. lleva la situacion al borde de guerra introduciendo en la Peninsula Coreana las flotillas de portaaviones nucleares y submarinos nucleares estrategicos.
					
					Se puede decir que las caracteristicas mas tipicas de un pais satelite se manifiestan en la falta de independencia y coraje para mencionar esa verdad cuando discuten la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Estamos consolidando por todos los medios el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa frente a la extremada politica hostil y a la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. 
					
					Criticar la opcion de autodefensa, que nos vimos obligados a tomar, haciendo vista gorda de la verdadera causa de agravacion de la tension no es una muestra de respeto a las leyes y reglas internacionales o una manifestacion de la posicion que parte de la aspiracion a la paz y estabilidad del mundo. Eso no pasa de ser un "gesto halagueno" y la "coparticipacion" para adular a los que instigan a esos paises detras de la cortina. 
					
					Si ellos estan interesados de veras en la defensa de la paz y estabilidad internacionales, no deberan actuarse segun el mandato de EE.UU., sino ponerse al frente en hacer valer la justicia internacional.

articles.title: CNCDP expone la posicion sobre el despliegue de THAAD en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CNCDP expone la posicion sobre el despliegue de THAAD en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que los gobernantes surcoreanos toman una actitud vacilante en el problema de emplazamiento del sistema antimisiles norteamericano THAAD, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) hizo publica este sabado una declaracion. 
					En estos tiempos, toma auge en el Sur de Corea la lucha de los habitantes de diferentes estratos por la cancelacion del despliegue de THAAD, senala la nota.
					
					El problema es que los conservadores y los estafadores politicos surcoreanos dicen que la revocacion de ubicacion de THAAD acordada con EE.UU. aflojara la "alianza Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos" y traera la "division de la opinion nacional", mientras las nuevas autoridades surcoreanas toman una actitud ambigua hablando de la "solucion seria" y del "proceso de aprobacion en la Asamblea Nacional", revela.
					
					Asevera que el emplazamiento o la retirada de THAAD es la piedra de toque que distingue la posicion servil a grandes potencias de la otra de dar importancia a la nacion.
					
					En ese asunto no se acepta ninguna conciliacion o concesion, destaca el documento y expone la siguiente posicion de principios:
					
					1. El emplazamiento de THAAD resulta un acto vendepatria para entregar para siempre el suelo surcoreano a EE.UU. como avanzada base militar para el cumplimiento de la estrategia de hegemonia mundial. 
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas deben exponer en claro su posicion tomando en consideracion que el despliegue de THAAD es una traicion a la patria para estimular los preparativos de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y ofrecerle el trampolin de agresion. 
					
					2. La ubicacion de THAAD es intolerable acto traidor para convertir la Peninsula Coreana en el campo de guerra nuclear de las potencias y buscar las calamidades nunca vistas. 
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas permiten por fin la colocacion de THAAD aceptando la demanda de EE.UU., cometeran un acto traidor que superaria al cometido por los "5 traidores de Ulsa". 
					
					Deben tomar la valiente decision de retirar de inmediato el sistema antimisiles sin olvidar que toda la nacion les observa con una mirada aguda. 
					
					3. La instalacion de THAAD deviene un crimen antinacional para eliminar con la ayuda del agresor el arma nuclear de justicia que garantizara siempre la dignidad, la seguridad y la prosperidad de la nacion. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben pensar en serio que fue un acto ridiculo y crimen antinacional la conducta de la banda de conservadores que actuo con desesperacion para eliminar el medio nuclear de justicia, lejos de aplaudirlo, mediante la instalacion del armamento mortifero del agresor. 
					
					El establecimiento de THAAD es una de las peores consecuencias del mandato de la camarilla de Park Geun-hye y su remocion es la fuerte demanda de la poblacion levantada en la lucha con velas e infrenable corriente de la epoca. 
					
					Cualquiera que tolere el despliegue de THAAD sera repudiado y condenado duro por la nacion, al igual que los conservadores traidores surcoreanos.

articles.title: Drone espia del Sur de Corea comete incursion en el cielo de la RPDC
articles.content:
Drone espia del Sur de Corea comete incursion en el cielo de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- Desde las 7:46 hasta las 20:40 del 26 de mayo, un drone de espionaje del Sur de Corea incursiono 4 veces en lo profundo del cielo jurisdiccional de la RPDC mientras sobrevolaba la zona candente del Mar Oeste y sus alrededores. 
					　Esta provocacion de los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano resulta mas grave porque coincide con que los imperialistas yanquis trasladaron los 4 drones Global Hawk y mas de 100 personas incluso los pilotos de la isla Guam a la base aerea de Yokota en Japon, cercana a la RPDC, bajo el pretexto de evacuarse del tifon. 
					
					　La nueva aventura militar parte del siniestro intento de frustrar la creciente demanda de la sociedad surcoreana sobre la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y desatar a toda costa la guerra de agresion contra la parte connacional en adhesion a las maniobras agresivas del patron norteamericano. 
					
					　El presente caso de provocacion de los belicistas titeres surcoreanos, que causan la escalada de tension en la Peninsula Coreana pese a la reiterada advertencia de la RPDC, producira la implacable reaccion de venganza del Ejercito Popular de Corea.

articles.title: Condenan el "documento de refutacion" presentado por el gobierno japones
articles.content:
Condenan el "documento de refutacion" presentado por el gobierno japones
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- El vocero del Comite Coreano por Medidas sobre el Problema de ex Esclavas Sexuales para el Ejercito Japones y Victimas de Reclutamiento Forzoso hizo publica el dia 27 una declaracion para condenar el "documento de refutacion" presentado por el gobierno japones. 
					En su reporte publicado en la primera quincena de mayo pasado, el Comite de la ONU contra la Tortura encomendo la revision del "acuerdo" Japon-Sur de Corea sobre el problema de esclavas sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones, comienza la nota y prosigue: 
					
					Ese documento definio a las esclavas sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones como victimas de esclavitud sexual implantada en el periodo de la Segunda Guerra Mundial y opino que el "acuerdo" Japon-Sur de Corea pactado a finales de 2015 es insuficiente para la recuperacion de honra de ellas. 
					
					El gobierno japones rechazo fuertemente el reporte del Comite de la ONU y presento el llamado "documento de refutacion".
					
					Describio el "acuerdo" como "definitivo e irreversible" protestando que "no es verdad y resulta impropia" la definicion de las "consoladoras" para el viejo ejercito japones como esclavas sexuales, hecha por el mencionado informe. 
					
					Asi el gobierno japones critica hasta el reporte de la organizacion internacional, que ha reflejado de modo imparcial la opinion publica mundial, para justificar sus crimenes del pasado, lo cual es una tergiversacion descarada de la historia, insulto a las victimas y desafio frontal a la sociedad internacional. 
					
					La evaluacion y la definicion de actos criminales no son responsabilidades del culpable. 
					
					Al criminal le compete unicamente la obligacion de reflexionar de sus pecados segun la sentencia dada por la justicia y la ley. 
					
					Al darse cuenta de que constituye un acto impropio y suicida tergiversar la historia y eludir las responsabilidades de los crimenes del pasado, las autoridades japonesas deberan cumplir con actitud sincera su obligacion juridica y moral sobre su expediente criminal.
